description.en:
The Maitre Pack contains 7 trailers. ATLAS 18. - Price: 30.300 € - Capacity: 24.200 L - Color configuration - Design configuration
DUMP 18T/21T. - Price: 43.500 € - Capacity: 10.800 L - Color configuration
VULCAIN 200 Simple axis. - Price: 35.500 € - Capacity: 19.000 L - Working width: 12.0 m - Color configuration
VULCAIN 200 Double axis. - Price: 49.500 € - Capacity: 19.000 L - Working width: 12.0 m - Color configuration
PMF 160 SP 9m. - Price: 15.400 € - Autoload - Capacity: 28 square bale / 35 round bale - Color configuration - Ladders fourragère
PMF 160 SP 10m. - Price: 17.100 € - Autoload - Capacity: 32 square bale / 40 round bale - Color configuration - Ladders configuration
PM6R 200 12m. - Price: 19.450 € - Autoload - Capacity: 40 square bale / 45 round bale - Color configuration - Ladders configuration

PMF 160 SP 9m: - Preis: 15.400 € - Autoload - Kapazität: 28 Quaderballen / 35 Rundballen - Farbwahl - Aufbau Konfiguration
PMF 160 SP 10m: - Preis: 17.100 € - Autoload - Kapazität: 32 Quaderballen / 40 Rundballen - Farbwahl - Aufbau Konfiguration
PM6R 200 12m: - Preis: 19.450 € - Autoload - Kapazität: 40 Quaderballen / 45 Rundballen - Farbwahl - Aufbau Konfiguration
